title: Share of the population who gave to charity in England 2019 , by age
summary: The chart at hand is a line chart where the x axis denotes Year and a y axis denotes Share of respondents. In total the number of data points it has is 6.
In general Share of respondents has rose over the Year.
Share of respondents is slightly increasing from 16_to_24 to 35_to_49, and finally roughly constant from 35_to_49 to 75_and_over.
The most drastic increase took place within the Year 16_to_24 and 25_to_34.
Maximum Share of respondents, about 83.0 was reported at Year 75_and_over
Minimum Share of respondents about 59.0 was reached at Year 16_to_24
